Platform.Processor: 1.2 GHz + Qualcomm Snapdragon MSM8226, Quad Core

Display.Other Display Features: Screenshot Capturing, Illumination Effect, Pan and Zoom, Face Detection, Scratch-resistant - Touch Panel Cover Glass, Auto Rotation, Touch Gesture - 10 Fingers Multi-touch, Picture Wallpaper, Wallpaper Animation, Sony TV Technology, Shake Control, Gesture Input

Internet & Connectivity.3G: Yes, 21 Mbps HSDPA; 5.76 Mbps HSUPA; HSPA+
Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (AVRCP 1.3, DUN 1.1, A2DP 1.2, HSP 1.2, HIDP 1.0, GAPC / LE, HFP 1.6, OPP 1.1, PANP 1.0)
Internet & Connectivity.Navigation Technology: A-GPS, GLONASS, with Google Maps with Street View and Latitude

Multimedia.Music Player: Yes, Supports ADTS, WAV, MP3, SMF, XMF, OTA, RTX, FLAC, iMelody, OGG, AMR, RTTTL

Other Features.Important Apps: Hangouts, YouTube, Movies Application, WALKMAN Application, Facebook, Twitter, Google Play, Google Voice Search, Google Search, Web Browser (WebKit), SyncML, Multiple IM, Xperia Link, Friends Application, Sony Media Apps, Album App, Xperia Care, Xperia Transfer, Gmail, Instant Messaging
Other Features.Sensors: Accelerometer, Proximity Sensor, Magnetometer, Ambient Light Sensor, eCompass

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories
